subject: Mathematics
question_en: If x + 1/x = 4, then what is the value of x^2 + 1/x^2?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: In a right-angled triangle, if the length of the hypotenuse is 10 cm and one of the other sides is 6 cm, then what is the length of the other side?
question_hi: एक वर्गाकार त्रिभुज में, यदि हाइपोटेन्यूज़ की लंबाई 10 सेमी है और एक अन्य पक्ष की लंबाई 6 सेमी है, तो दूसरे पक्ष की लंबाई क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the mean of the following data: 12, 15, 18, 20, 22?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the perimeter of the triangle with sides 5, 12, and 13?
question_hi: त्रिभुज का परिधि जिसके पक्ष 5, 12, और 13 हैं, क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If x^2 - 4x + 4 = 0, then what is the value of x?
question_hi: यदि x^2 - 4x + 4 = 0, तो x का मान क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If f(x) = 2x^2 + 3x - 4, then what is the derivative of f(x) with respect to x?
question_hi: यदि f(x) = 2x^2 + 3x - 4, तो f(x) की विविधता x के प्रति क्या है?
explanation_en: Derivative of f(x) = 2x^2 + 3x - 4 with respect to x = 4x + 3
explanation_hi: f(x) की विविधता x के प्रति 4x + 3 है

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the median of the following data: 10, 12, 15, 18, 20?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: What is the area of the circle with radius 7 cm?
question_hi: व्यास 7 सेमी वाले वृत्त का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
explanation_en: Area of circle = π * r^2 => Area = π * 7^2 => Area = 49π
explanation_hi: वृत्त का क्षेत्रफल = π * r^2 => क्षेत्रफल = π * 7^2 => क्षेत्रफल = 49π

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If x^2 + 4x - 3 = 0, then what is the value of x?
question_hi: यदि x^2 + 4x - 3 = 0, तो x का मान क्या है?

subject: Mathematics
question_en: If f(x) = 3x^2 - 2x + 1, then what is the derivative of f(x) with respect to x?
question_hi: यदि f(x) = 3x^2 - 2x + 1, तो f(x) की विविधता x के प्रति क्या है?
explanation_en: Derivative of f(x) = 3x^2 - 2x + 1 with respect to x = 6x - 2
explanation_hi: f(x) की विविधता x के प्रति 6x - 2 है
